eu.wauz.wauzcore.menu

Class ShopMenu

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.wauz.wauzcore.menu.ShopMenu
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WauzInventory

    public class ShopMenu
extends java.lang.Object
implements WauzInventory
    An inventory that can be used as menu or for other custom interaction mechanics. Used to buy, sell or repair items for different currencies.
    Author:
    Wauzmons
    See Also:
    WauzShop, WauzShopActions

      • open

        public static void open(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                        java.lang.String shopName,
                        java.lang.String citizenName)
        Opens the menu for the given player. Shows all buyable items. If the shop is global, only global currencies will be additionally shown. Otherwhise all major currencies, aswell as repair and sell options are shown. Empty slots will be filled with "SOLD OUT" displays.
        Parameters:
        player - The player that should view the inventory.
        shopName - The name of the shop to load.
        citizenName - The name of the citizen who owns the shop.
        See Also:
        WauzShop.getShop(String), WauzShop.getShopItems(), WauzShopItem.getInstance(Player, WauzShopDiscount, boolean), MenuUtils.setBorders(Inventory)

      • selectMenuPoint

        public void selectMenuPoint(org.bukkit.event.inventory.InventoryClickEvent event)
        Checks if an event in this inventory was triggered by a player click. Cancels the event and initiates the corresponding buy, sell or repair event. On an anvil click items on the cursor are repaired, while they are sold on a barrier click.
        Specified by:
        selectMenuPoint in interface WauzInventory
        Parameters:
        event - The inventory click event.
        See Also:
        WauzShopActions.buy(Player, WauzShopItem, WauzShopDiscount), WauzShopActions.sell(Player, ItemStack, boolean), WauzShopActions.repair(Player, ItemStack, boolean)
